Tuesday 20 May 2014 12:52 p.m. Almost 2000 Chinese citizens have been evacuated from riot - hit Vietnam by sea with another two ships following , as Hanoi stifled fresh protests over a territorial dispute and foreign investors counted the cost .

They were among four Chinese ships - each with a capacity of about 1,000 people - sent to Vietnam , Xinhua said , with another two on standby .
